channel.title: From An Egg
channel.description: Recent content on From An Egg

item.title: YUI in the Wild
item.description:
Earlier today I talked with some of the YUI team about the Juju GUI and how we use YUI for the first ‘YUI in the wild’﻿.

The links I mentioned in the video:

  • Juju GUI Demo Site
  • Juju GUI Bazaar repository
  • Juju GUI Git repository

item.title: YUIConf talk 2012
item.description: My talk from YUIConf 2012, where I showcase the issues of modern web development that arise when using various libraries and explain how the features of YUI make it a clear leader for development teams of any size. I discuss standard development procedures, modular development and extensibility, API consistency, documentation, and testing. Hope you enjoy, Let me know what you think!
